cause.description:
To visit jhr's official Facebook community, go here: http://www.facebook.com/pages/jhr-Journalists-for-Human-Rights/39239717987
jhr’s goal is to make everyone in the world fully aware of their rights. Creating rights awareness is the first and most necessary step to ending rights abuses. By mobolizing media to spread rights awareness, jhr informs people about their rights, empowering marginalized people to stand up, speak out and protect themselves.
jhr has trained over 2000 African journalists, producing over 3000 human rights stories across Africa and reaching 20 million Africans regularly with human rights information.
jhr is headquartered in Toronto, Canada, and has country offices in the Congo (DRC), Liberia, and Sierra Leone, as well as a presence in 13 other African countries. jhr also has chapters in over 40 high schools and universities across Canada, encouraging young Canadians to spread rights awareness in their communities.
1. jhr seeks to eliminate the need for the work it does
2. jhr limits its time in each country to five-years, so we can create change without creating a dependency
3. jhr always works in close partnership with local organizations
